attributes.title: Half-Life Rap
attributes.caption: Half-Life was just eyeing us all mad like, "why haven't you made a rap about me yet?!" And then we said, "k", and made this.
attributes.description: Half-Life was just eyeing us all mad like, "why haven't you made a rap about me yet?!" And then we said, "k", and made this.
attributes.display_title: Half-Life Rap

attributes.title: Deltarune Rap (feat. CG5) - "I Can Do Anything"
attributes.caption: Boo hoo, uee hee hee....is it time, time for a Deltarune Rap?
attributes.description: Boo hoo, uee hee hee....is it time, time for a Deltarune Rap?
attributes.display_title: Deltarune Rap (feat. CG5) - "I Can Do Anything"

attributes.title: Resident Evil 2 Rap - "Far From Alive"
attributes.caption: This track goes out to all the living and undead people of Raccoon City!
attributes.description: This track goes out to all the living and undead people of Raccoon City!
attributes.display_title: Resident Evil 2 Rap - "Far From Alive"

attributes.title: Rust Rap - "Naked and Nasty"
attributes.caption: Living life in the world of Rust is dangerous. It's even more dangerous when they're out to get you as a naked.
attributes.description: Living life in the world of Rust is dangerous. It's even more dangerous when they're out to get you as a naked.
attributes.display_title: Rust Rap - "Naked and Nasty"

attributes.title: Apex Legends Rap
attributes.caption: So Apex Legends came out of nowhere, eh? We didn't hesitate and partnered with Rockit Gaming to make this rap!
attributes.description: So Apex Legends came out of nowhere, eh? We didn't hesitate and partnered with Rockit Gaming to make this rap!
attributes.display_title: Apex Legends Rap

attributes.title: Bioshock Rap - "Would You Kindly"
attributes.caption: We love Bioshock if you haven't gotten that by now. We partnered with Divide to create this banger about Frank Fontaine and all his conniving puppet mastery from the Bioshock games.
attributes.description: We love Bioshock if you haven't gotten that by now. We partnered with Divide to create this banger about Frank Fontaine and all his conniving puppet mastery from the Bioshock games.
attributes.display_title: Bioshock Rap - "Would You Kindly"

attributes.title: Anthem Rap - "Echoes of the Anthem"
attributes.caption: I was sold at "it's like Iron Man". Here's our Anthem Rap, let's goooooo!
attributes.description: I was sold at "it's like Iron Man". Here's our Anthem Rap, let's goooooo!
attributes.display_title: Anthem Rap - "Echoes of the Anthem"

attributes.title: Metro Exodus Song - "Keep Some Faith"
attributes.caption: The Metro video game series is such a fresh take and perspective on game storytelling and with that this was a fun song to tackle.
attributes.description: The Metro video game series is such a fresh take and perspective on game storytelling and with that this was a fun song to tackle.
attributes.display_title: Metro Exodus Song - "Keep Some Faith"

attributes.title: The Division 2 Rap - "Wake Me"
attributes.caption: All right sleeper agents, it's time to wake up and listen to this Division 2 Rap.
attributes.description: All right sleeper agents, it's time to wake up and listen to this Division 2 Rap.
attributes.display_title: The Division 2 Rap - "Wake Me"

attributes.title: Hello Neighbor Rap - Live Action Music Video
attributes.caption: A JT Music classic gets revisited as we see the Hello Neighbor Rap, "Hello and Goodbye", get a live action adaptation. Enjoy!
attributes.description: A JT Music classic gets revisited as we see the Hello Neighbor Rap, "Hello and Goodbye", get a live action adaptation. Enjoy!
attributes.display_title: Hello Neighbor Rap - Live Action Music Video

attributes.title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice Rap - "Dance of the Swords"
attributes.caption: Thank god you can resurrect yourself in Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice. For fun, once you finish listening to this song, you should listen again...think of it as resurrecting?
attributes.description: Thank god you can resurrect yourself in Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice. For fun, once you finish listening to this song, you should listen again...think of it as resurrecting?
attributes.display_title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice Rap - "Dance of the Swords"

attributes.title: Mr. X Rap - "Ready or Not"
attributes.caption: MR X can spit some verses. That's pretty impressive for such a quiet guy.
attributes.description: MR X can spit some verses. That's pretty impressive for such a quiet guy.
attributes.display_title: Mr. X Rap - "Ready or Not"

attributes.title: Game of Thrones Song - "Break the Night"
attributes.caption: So who ya think is Azor Ahai?!?!
attributes.description: So who ya think is Azor Ahai?!?!
attributes.display_title: Game of Thrones Song - "Break the Night"

attributes.title: Apex Legends Rap - "Lonely at the Top"
attributes.caption: It's a good thing Apex Legends is so popular because we felt like making another song for it.
attributes.description: It's a good thing Apex Legends is so popular because we felt like making another song for it.

attributes.title: Mortal Kombat 11 Rap - "Fatalities, Pt. 2"
attributes.caption: We team up with Rockit Gaming yet again for a Mortal Kombat Rap! This time we team up and pay homage to one our best collabs!
attributes.description: We team up with Rockit Gaming yet again for a Mortal Kombat Rap! This time we team up and pay homage to one our best collabs!
attributes.display_title: Mortal Kombat 11 Rap - "Fatalities, Pt. 2"

attributes.display_title: "Ride or Die" - Live Action RDR 2 Music Video

attributes.title: Cuphead Rap (Dirty Dish Remix)

attributes.description: Here's the Cuphead Rap Remix you never asked for. Enjoy!
attributes.display_title: Cuphead Rap (Dirty Dish Remix)

attributes.title: John Wick Rap - "Get Wick'd"

attributes.title: Uncharted Rap - "Take a Leap of Faith"

attributes.description: Uncharted Rap...whaaa??? Well, better late than never! Here is our long overdue song tribute to the Uncharted game series. Enjoy!

attributes.title: Mordhau Rap - "Hold The Line"
attributes.caption: What started as a goofy song turned into a nerdcore anthem of the ever fun and chaotic melee-combat-game, Mordhau.

attributes.description: DHeusta crushes it on this remix of our Assassin's Creed Odyssey Rap!

attributes.title: Wolfenstein Youngblood Rap - "Run With the Wolves"

attributes.title: The Boys Rap - "Getcha Hands Dirty"
attributes.caption: The good guys are the bad guys? Whoa. Hope you all enjoy our rap about The Boys! Thanks to DaddyPhatSnaps and Andrea Storm Kaden for hopping on the track as well.
attributes.description: The good guys are the bad guys? Whoa. Hope you all enjoy our rap about The Boys! Thanks to DaddyPhatSnaps and Andrea Storm Kaden for hopping on the track as well.

attributes.title: The Sinking City Rap - "Dreaming of Me"
attributes.caption: If you've been paying attention, we love games that have amazing atmospheres and words and The Sinking City is no exception. We hope you enjoy our rap for Sinking City!
attributes.description: If you've been paying attention, we love games that have amazing atmospheres and words and The Sinking City is no exception. We hope you enjoy our rap for Sinking City!

attributes.title: FNAF VR Help Wanted Song (Animated Version) -
attributes.caption: We loved the original video for this song, but an SFM animation really helps this song really shine!
attributes.description: We loved the original video for this song, but an SFM animation really helps this song really shine! We have tons of new stuff for new releases coming up for you all through to the holidays!
attributes.display_title: FNAF VR Help Wanted Song (Animated Version) -

attributes.title: Blair Witch Rap - "Don't Put Me in a Corner"

attributes.title: IT: Chapter 2 Rap - "What You're Scared Of"

attributes.title: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening Rap - "Memories"
attributes.caption: Our first Nintendo game song in our 11 years of doing this video game rap thing. It seems fitting that Zelda: Link's Awakening was the first to get the JT Music treatment!
attributes.description: Our first Nintendo game song in our 11 years of doing this video game rap thing. It seems fitting that Zelda: Link's Awakening was the first to get the JT Music treatment!

attributes.title: Gears of War 5 Rap - "No Stopping the Gears"

attributes.description: We missed Gears last time around. We were sure to not make that mistake again and made this Gears of War 5 Rap. Enjoy!

attributes.title: Doom Rap - "Fight Like Hell" (Remastered)
attributes.caption: The original Doom Rap was always one of our favorite songs and to remaster it was truly a wonderful experience. We hope you guys enjoy it!

attributes.caption: 2019 was a wild ride! We're super thankful for all you being there with us for it.
attributes.description: 2019 was a wild ride! We're super thankful for all you being there with us for it.

attributes.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Rap - "Night on Fire"

attributes.description: We're pretty hype for Cyberpunk 2077 if that wasn't already clear with this Cyberpunk 2077 Rap! Happy Holidays!

attributes.title: The Outer Worlds Rap - "I'm a Yahoo"
attributes.caption: Somehow The Outer Worlds slipped under our radar! We were sure not to miss it especially with it feeling so much like a Fallout game. Enjoy our The Outer Worlds Rap!
attributes.description: Somehow The Outer Worlds slipped under our radar! We were sure not to miss it especially with it feeling so much like a Fallout game. Enjoy our The Outer Worlds Rap!
